name: Snap-on Scan Data File
summary: A PIDS file is a scan data file created by Snap-on diagnostic and information system tools, such as Verus Pro, Zeus, and Verdict. It contains data in XML format from a vehicle scan, including brake and fuel pump status, barometric pressure, engine speed, and valve timing.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PIDS file open in Snap-on ShopStream Connect 7
images.alt: PIDS file open in Snap-on ShopStream Connect 7
